artist_title: Hafdís Huld - Frost er úti fuglinn minn
lyrics:
2 ContributorsHeliand (Old Saxon) Lyrics1 *Manega uuâron, the sia iro môd gespôn,
2 .........................,nnnnnnnn that sia ,
3  that girûni, that  rîceo Crist
4 undar mancunnea mâriða gifrumida
5 mid uuordun endi mid uuercun. That uuolda thô uuîsara filo
6 liudo barno loƀon, lêra Cristes,
7 hêlag uuord godas, endi mid iro handon scrîƀan
8  an buok, huô sia 
9 frummian, firiho barn. Than uuârun thoh sia fiori te thiu
10 under thera menigo, thia habdon maht godes,
11 helpa fan himila, hêlagna gêst,
12 craft fan  - sia uurðun gicorana te thio,
13 that sie than êuangelium  
14 an buok scrîƀan endo sô manag gibod godes,
15 hêlag himilisc uuord: sia ne muosta heliðo than mêr,
16 firiho barno frummian, neuan that sia fiori te thio
17 thuru craft godas gecorana uurðun,
18 Matheus endi Marcus, - sô uuârun thia man hêtana -
19 ; sia uuârun  ,
20 uuirðiga ti them giuuirkie. Habda im uualdand god,
21 them heliðon an iro hertan hêlagna gêst
22 fasto bifolhan endi ferahtan hugi,
23 sô manag uuîslîk uuord endi giuuit mikil,
24 that sea scoldin ahebbean hêlagaro stemnun
25 godspell that guoda, that ni haƀit ênigan gigadon huergin,
26 thiu uuord an thesaro uueroldi, that io uualdand mêr,
27 drohtin diurie eftho derƀi thing,
28 firinuuerc fellie ,
29   - , huand hie habda starkan hugi,
30 mildean endi guodan, thie the mêster uuas,
31  .
32 That scoldun sea fiori thuo fingron scrîƀan,
33 settian endi singan endi seggean forð,
34 that sea fan Cristes crafte them mikilon
35 gisâhun endi gihôrdun, thes hie selƀo gisprac,
36 giuuîsda endi giuuarahta, uundarlîcas filo,
37 sô manag mid mannon mahtig drohtin,
38 all so hie it fan them anginne thuru is  craht,
39 uualdand gisprak, thuo hie êrist thesa uuerold giscuop
40 endi thuo all bifieng mid ênu uuordo,
41 himil endi erða endi al that sea bihlidan êgun
42 giuuarahtes endi giuuahsanes: that uuarð thuo all mid uuordon godas
43 fasto bifangan, endi  after thiu,
44 huilic than liudscepi landes scoldi
45 uuîdost giuualdan, eftho  thiu 
46  . Ên uuas iro thuo noh than
47  barnun biforan, endi  fîƀi uuârun agangan:
48 scolda thuo that sehsta sâliglîco
49 cuman thuru craft godes endi Cristas giburd,
50 hêlandero , hêlagas gêstes,
51 an thesan middilgard managon te helpun,
52 firio barnon ti frumon uuið fîundo nîð,
53 uuið dernero duualm. Than habda thuo drohtin god
54 Rômanoliudeon farliuuan rîkeo mêsta,
55 habda them heriscipie herta gisterkid,
56 that sia habdon bithuungana thiedo gihuilica,
57 habdun fan Rûmuburg rîki giuunnan
58 helmgitrôsteon, sâton iro heritogon
59 an lando gihuem, habdun liudeo giuuald,
60 allon elitheodon. Erodes uuas
61 an Hierusalem oƀer that Iudeono folc
62 gicoran te kuninge, sô ina thie kêser tharod,
63 fon Rûmuburg rîki thiodan
64 satta undar that gisîði. Hie ni uuas thoh mid sibbeon 
65 aƀaron Israheles, eðiligiburdi,
66 cuman fon iro , neuan that hie thuru thes kêsures thanc
67 fan Rûmuburg rîki habda,
68 that im uuârun sô gihôriga hildiscalcos,
69 aƀaron Israheles elleanruoƀa:
70 suîðo unuuanda uuini, than lang hie giuuald êhta,
71 Erodes thes rîkeas endi  
72 . Than uuas thar ên gigamalod mann,
73 that uuas fruod gomo, habda ferehtan hugi,
74 uuas fan them liudeon Levias cunnes,
75 Iacobas , guodero thiedo:
76 Zacharias uuas hie hêtan. That uuas sô sâlig man,
77 huand hie simblon gerno gode theonoda,
78 uuarahta  is uuilleon; deda is uuîf sô self
79 - uuas iru gialdrod idis: ni muosta im erƀiuuard
80 an iro iuguðhêdi giƀiðig uuerðan -
81 libdun im farûter laster, uuaruhtun lof goda,
82 uuârun sô gihôriga heƀancuninge,
83 diuridon ûsan drohtin: ni uueldun derƀeas uuiht
84 under mancunnie, mênes gifrummean,
85 ne *saca ne sundea. Uuas im thoh an sorgun hugi,
86 that sie erƀiuuard êgan ni môstun,
87 ac uuârun im barno lôs. Than scolda he gibod godes
88 thar an Hierusalem, sô oft sô is gigengi gistôd,
89 that ina torhtlîco tîdi gimanodun,
90 sô scolda he at them uuîha uualdandes geld
91 hêlag bihuuerƀan, heƀancuninges,
92 godes iungarskepi: gern uuas he suîðo,
93 that he  thurh ferhtan hugi  môsti.
94 Thô uuarð thiu tîd cuman, -  thar gitald habdun
95 uuîsa man mid uuordun, - that scolda thana uuîh godes
96 Zacharias bisehan. Thô uuarð thar gisamnod filu
97 thar te Hierusalem  liudi,
98 uuerodes te them uuîha, thar sie uualdand god
99 suuîðo theolîco thiggean scoldun,
100 hêrron is huldi, that sie heƀancuning
101 lêðes alêti. Thea liudi stôdun
102 umbi that hêlaga hûs, endi geng im the  man
103 an thana uuîh innan. That uuerod ôðar bêd
104 umbi thana alah ûtan, Ebreo liudi,
105  the frôdo man gifrumid habdi
106 uualdandes uuilleon. Sô he thô thana uuîrôc drôg,
107  aftar them alaha, endi umbi thana altari geng
108 mid is rôcfatun rîkiun thionon,
109 -  ferhtlîco frâon sînes,
110 godes iungarskepi gerno suuîðo
111 mid hluttru hugi, *sô man hêrren scal
112  fulgangan -,   im,
113 egison an them alahe: hie gisah thar aftar thiu ênna engil godes
114 an them uuîhe innan, hie sprac im mid is uuordun tuo,
115 hiet that fruod gumo foroht ni uuâri,
116 hiet that hie im ni andriede: ʽthîna dâdi sindʼ, quathie*,
117 ʽuualdanda uuerðe endi thîn uuord sô self,
118 thîn thionost is im an thanke, that thu sulica githâht haƀes
119 an is ênes craft. Ic is engil bium,
120 Gabriel bium ic hêtan, the gio for goda standu,
121 anduuard for them alouualdon, ne sî that he me an is  
122 sendean uuillea. Nu hiet he me an thesan sîð faran,
123 hiet that ic thi  gicûðdi, that thi kind giboran,
124 fon thînera alderu idis ôdan scoldi
125 uuerðan an thesero uueroldi, uuordun spâhi.
126 That ni scal an is liƀa gio lîðes ,
127 uuînes an is uueroldi: sô haƀed im uurdgiscapu,
128 metod gimarcod endi maht godes.
129 Hêt that ic thi thoh sagdi, that it scoldi gisîð uuesan
130 heƀancuninges, hêt that  it heldin uuel,
131 tuhin thurh treuua, quað that he im tîras sô filu
132 an godes rîkea forgeƀan uueldi.
133 He quað that the gôdo gumo Iohannes te namon
134 hebbean scoldi,  that   hêtin sô,
135 that kind, than it quâmi, quað that it Kristes gisîð
136 an thesaro uuîdun uuerold uuerðan scoldi,
137 is selƀes sunies, endi quað that   herod
138 an is  bêðe quâmin.ʼ
139 Zacharias thô gimahalda endi uuið  sprac
140 drohtines engil, endi im thero dâdeo bigan,
141 uundron thero uuordo: ʽhuuô mag that giuuerðan sôʼ, quað he,
142 ʽaftar an aldre? it is unc al te lat
143 sô te giuuinnanne, sô thu mid thînun uuordun .
144 Huuanda uuit habdun aldres êr efno tuêntig
145 uuintro an uncro uueroldi, êr than quâmi  uuîf te mi;
146 than uuârun uuit nu atsamna  uuintro
147 gibenkeon endi gibeddeon, siðor ic sie mi te brûdi gecôs.
148 Sô uuit  an uncro iuguði  ni mohtun,
149 that uuit erƀiuuard êgan môstin,
150 fôdean an uncun flettea, nu uuit sus gifrôdod sint
151 - haƀad unc eldi binoman elleandâdi,
152 that uuit sint an uncro siuni gislekit endi an uncun sîdun lat;
153 flêsk is unc , fel unscôni,
154 is unca  giliðen, lîk ,
155 sind unca andbâri ôðarlîcaron,
156 môd endi megincraft -, sô uuit giu sô managan dag
157 uuârun an thesero uueroldi, sô mi thes uundar thunkit,
158  it sô giuuerðan mugi, sô thu mid thînun uuordun .
159 Thô uuarð that heƀencuninges bodon harm an is môde,
160 that he is giuuerkes sô uundron scolda
161 endi that ni uuelda gihuggean, that ina   god
162 sô alaiungan, sô he fon êrist uuas,
163 selƀo giuuirkean,  he sô uueldi.
164 Skerida im thô te uuîtea, that he ni mahte ênig uuord ,
165 gimahlien mid is mûðu, ʽêr than thi magu uuirðid,
166 fon thînero aldero idis erl afôdit,
167 kindiung giboran cunnies gôdes,
168 uuânum te thesero uueroldi. Than scalt thu eft uuord sprekan,
169 hebbean thînaro stemna giuuald; ni tharft thu stum uuesan
170 lengron huîla.ʼ Thô uuarð it sân gilêstid sô,
171 giuuorðan te uuâron, sô thar an them uuîha gisprak
172 engil thes alouualdon: uuarð ald gumo
173 sprâca bilôsit, thoh he spâhan hugi
174 bâri an is breostun. Bidun allan dag
175 that uuerod for them uuîha endi uundrodun alla,
176 bihuuî he thar sô lango, lofsâlig man,
177 suuîðo frôd gumo frâon sînun
178 thionon thorfti, sô thar êr ênig thegno ni deda,
179 than sie thar  them uuîha uualdandes geld
180 folmon frumidun. Thô quam frôd gumo
181 ût fon them alaha. Erlos thrungun
182 nâhor mikilu: uuas im niud mikil,
183 huat he im sôðlîkes seggean uueldi,
184 uuîsean te uuâron. He ni mohta thô ênig uuord ,
185 giseggean them gisiðea,  that he mid is suîðron hand
186 uuîsda them uueroda, that sie ûses uualdandes
187 lêra lêstin. Thea liudi forstôdun,
188 that he thar habda gegnungo godcundes 
189 forsehen selƀo, thoh he is ni mahti giseggean uuiht,
190 giuuîsean te uuâron. Thô habda he ûses uualdandes
191 geld gilêstid, al sô is gigengi uuas
192 gimarcod mid mannun. Thô uuarð sân aftar thiu maht godes,
193 gicûðid is craft : uuarð thiu  ôcan,
194 idis an ira eldiu: scolda im erƀiuuard,
195 suîðo godcund gumo giƀiðig uuerðan,
196 barn an . Bêd aftar thiu
197 that uuîf . Skrêd the uuintar forð,
198 geng  gêres gital. Iohannes quam
199 an liudeo lioht: lîk uuas im scôni,
200 uuas im fel fagar, fahs endi naglos,
201 uuangun  im uulitige. Thô fôrun thar uuîse man,
202 snelle tesamne, thea suâsostun mêst,
203 uundrodun thes , bi it gio mahti giuuerðan sô,
204 that  sô aldun tuêm ôdan uurði
205 barn an , ni uuâri that it gibod godes
206 selƀes uuâri:  sie garo,
207 that it elcor sô uuânlîc uuerðan ni mahti.
208 Thô sprak thar ên gifrôdot man, the sô filo consta
209 uuîsaro uuordo, habde giuuit mikil,
210 frâgode , huuat is namo scoldi
211 uuesan an thesaro uueroldi: ʽmi thunkid an is uuîsu gilîc
212 iac an is gibârea, that he sî betara than uui,
213 sô ic , that ina ûs gegnungo  fon himila
214  sendiʼ. Thô sprac sân 
215  môdar thes kindes, thiu thana magu habda,
216 that barn an ire barme: ʽhêr quam  godesʼ, quað siu,
217 ʽfernun gêre, furmon uuordu
218 , that he Iohannes bi godes lêrun
219 hêtan scoldi. That ic an mînumu hugi ni 
220 uuendean mid uuihti, of ic is giuualdan môtʼ.
221 Thô sprac ên gêlhert man, the ira gaduling uuas:
222 ʽne hêt êr giouuiht sôʼ, quað he, ʽaðalboranes
223 ûses cunnies eftho cnôsles. Uuita kiasan im ôðrana
224 niudsamna namon: he  of he môtiʼ.
225 Thô sprac eft the frôdo man, the thar consta filo mahlian:
226 ʽni giƀu ic that te râdeʼ, quað he, ʽrinco negênun,
227 that  uuord godes uuendean biginna;
228 ac  is thana fader frâgon, the  sô gifrôdod sitit,
229 uuîs an is uuînseli: thoh he ni mugi ênig uuord ,
230 thoh mag he bi bôcstaƀon brêf geuuirkean,
231 namon giscrîƀanʼ. Thô he nâhor geng,
232 legda im êna bôc an barm endi 
233 uurîtan uuîslîco uuordgimerkiun,
234 huat sie that hêlaga barn hêtan scoldin.
235 Thô nam he     endi an is hugi thâhte
236 suîðo gerno te gode: Iohannes namon
237 uuîslîco giuurêt endi  aftar mid is uuordu gisprac
238 suîðo spâhlîco: habda im eft is sprâca giuuald,
239 giuuitteas endi . That uuîti uuas thô agangan,
240 hard harmscare,  im hêlag god
241 mahtig , that he  môdseƀon
242 godes ni forgâti, than he im eft sendi is iungron tô.
243 Thô ni uuas lang aftar thiu, ne it al sô gilêstid uuarð,
244 sô he mancunnea managa huîla,
245 god alomahtig forgeƀen habda,
246 that he is himilisc barn herod te uueroldi,
247 si selƀes sunu sendean ,
248 te thiu that he hêr alôsdi ,
249 uuerod fon uuîtea.  uuarð is 
250 an Galilealand, Gabriel cuman,
251 engil thes alouualdon, thar he êne idis uuisse,
252 munilîca magað: Maria uuas siu hêten,
253 uuas iru thiorna githigan. Sea ên thegan habda,
254 Ioseph gimahlit, gôdes cunnies man,
255 thea Dauides dohter: that uuas  diurlîc uuîf,
256 idis anthêti. Thar sie the engil godes
257  Nazarethburg bi namon selƀo
258 grôtte  endi sie fon gode quedda:
259 ʽHêl uuis thu, Mariaʼ, quað he, ʽthu bist thînun hêrron liof,
260 uualdande uuirðig, huuand thu giuuit haƀes,
261 idis enstio fol. Thu scalt  allun uuesan
262 uuîƀun giuuîhit. Ne haƀe  uuêcan hugi,
263 ne forhti thu thînun ferhe: ne quam ic thi te ênigun frêson herod,
264 ne dragu ic  . Thu scalt ûses drohtines uuesan
265 môdar mid mannun endi scalt thana magu fôdean,
266 thes   . The scal Hêliand te namon
267 êgan mid eldiun.  endi ni kumid,
268 thes uuîdon rîkeas ,  he giuualdan scal,
269 mâri theodan.ʼ Thô sprac im  thiu magað angegin,
270 uuið thana engil godes idiso scôniost,
271 allaro uuîƀo uulitigost: ʽhuô mag that giuuerðen sôʼ,  siu,
272 ʽthat ic magu fôdie? Ne ic gio mannes ni uuarð
273 uuîs an mînera uueroldi.ʼ Thô habde eft is uuord garu
274 engil thes alouualdon thero idisiu tegegnes:
275 ʽan thi scal hêlag gêst fon heƀanuuange
276 cuman thurh craft godes.  scal thi kind ôdan
277 uuerðan an thesaro uueroldi. Uualdandes craft
278 scal thi fon them hôhoston heƀancuninge
279 scadouuan mid . Ni uuarð scôniera giburd,
280 ne sô mâri mid mannun, huand siu kumid thurh maht godes
281 an  uuîdon uuerold.ʼ Thô uuarð  thes uuîbes hugi
282 aftar them ârundie al gihuorƀen
283 an godes uuilleon. ʽ ic hêr garu standuʼ, quað siu,
284 ʽte sulicun ambahtskepi, sô he mi êgan uuili.
285 Thiu bium ic theotgodes. Nu ik  thinges gitrûon;
286 uuerðe mi aftar thînun uuordun, al sô is uuilleo sî,
287 hêrron mînes; nis mi hugi tuîfli,
288 ne uuord ne uuîsa.ʼ Sô gifragn ik, that that uuîf antfeng
289 that godes ârundi gerno suîðo
290 mid leohtu hugi endi mid  gôdun
291 endi mid hluttrun treuun.  the hêlago gêst,
292 that barn  ira bôsma; endi siu ira breostun 
293 iac an ire seƀon selƀo, sagda them siu uuelda,
294 that sie habde giôcana thes alouualdon craft
295 hêlag fon himile. Thô uuarð hugi Iosepes,
296 is môd , the im êr thea magað habda,
297 thea idis anthêttea, aðalcnôsles uuîf
298 giboht im te brûdiu. He afsôf  siu habda barn undar iru:
299 ni uuânda thes mid uuihti,  iru that uuîf habdi
300 giuuardod sô : ni  uualdandes thô noh
301 blîði gibodskepi. Ni uuelda sia imo te brûdi thô,
302 halon imo te hîuuon, ac bigan im thô  hugi thenkean,
303 huô he sie  forlêti, sô iru thar nu uurði lêdes ,
304 ôdan . Ni uuelda sie aftar thiu
305 meldon for menigi: antdrêd that sie manno barn
306 lîƀu binâmin. Sô uuas  thero liudeo thau
307 thurh then aldon êu, Ebreo folkes,
308 sô huilik sô thar an unreht idis gihîuuida,
309 that siu simbla thana bedskepi buggean scolda,
310 frî mid ira ferhu: ni uuas gio thiu fêmea sô gôd,
311 that siu  them liudun leng libbien môsti,
312 uuesan undar them uueroda.  im the uuîso mann,
313 suîðo gôd gumo, Ioseph an is môda
314 thenkean thero thingo, huô he thea thiornun thô
315 listiun forlêti. Thô ni uuas lang te thiu,
316 that im thar an drôma quam drohtines engil,
317 heƀancuninges bodo, endi hêt sie ina haldan uuel,
318 minnion sie an is môde: ʽNi uuis thuʼ, quað he, ʽMariun uurêð,
319 thiornun thînaro; siu is  uuîf;
320 ne forhugi thu sie te hardo; thu scalt sie haldan uuel,
321 uuardon ira an thesaro uueroldi. Lêsti  inca uuinitreuua
322 forð sô thu dâdi,   incan friundskepi uuel!
323 Ne lât thu sie thi thiu lêðaron, thoh siu  ira liðon êgi,
324 barn an ira bôsma. It cumid thurh gibod godes,
325 hêlages gêstes fon heƀanuuanga:
326 that is  Krist, godes êgan barn,
327 uualdandes sunu. Thu scalt sie uuel ,
328 hêlaglîco. Ne lât thu  thînan hugi tuîflien,
329 merrean thîna môdgithâht.ʼ Thô uuarð eft thes mannes hugi
330  aftar them uuordun, that he im te them uuîƀa genam,
331 te thera magað minnea: antkenda maht godes,
332 uualdandes gibod. Uuas im uuilleo mikil,
333 that he  sô hêlaglîco haldan môsti:
334 bisorgoda sie an is , endi  sô sûƀro 
335 al te huldi godes hêlagna gêst,
336 gôdlîcan gumon, antthat sie  giscapu
337 mahtig gimanodun, that   an manno lioht,
338 allaro barno bezt, brengean scolda.
339 Thô uuarð fon Rûmuburg rîkes mannes
340 oƀar alla thesa irminthiod Octauiânas
341 ban endi bodskepi oƀar thea is brêdon giuuald
342 cuman fon them kêsure cuningo gihuilicun,
343 hêmsitteandiun, sô uuîdo sô is heritogon
344 oƀar al that landskepi  giuueldun.
345  that  thea elilendiun man iro ôðil sôhtin,
346  iro handmahal angegen iro hêrron bodon,
347 quâmi te them cnôsla gihue, thanan he cunneas uuas,
348 giboran fon them burgiun. That gibod uuarð gilêstid
349 oƀar thesa uuîdon uuerold. Uuerod samnoda
350  allaro burgeo gihuuem. Fôrun thea bodon oƀar all,
351 thea fon them kêsura cumana uuâ*run,
352 bôkspâha uueros,  an brêf 
353  niudlîco namono ,
354 ia land ia liudi, that im ni   mann
355 gumono sulica gambra, sô  scolda geldan gihue
356 heliðo fon is hôƀda. Thô giuuêt im ôc  is hîuuisca
357 Ioseph the gôdo, sô it god mahtig,
358 uualdand uuelda: sôhta im   hêm,
359 thea burg an Bethleem, thar iro beiðero uuas,
360 thes heliðes handmahal* endi ôc thera hêlagun thiornun,
361 Mariun thera gôdun. Thar uuas thes mâreon stôl
362 an êrdagun, aðalcuninges,
363 Dauides thes gôdon, than  the he thana druhtskepi thar,
364 erl undar Ebreon êgan môsta,
365 haldan hôhgisetu.  uuârun is hîuuiscas,
366 cuman fon is cnôsla, cunneas gôdes,
367 bêðiu bi giburdiun. Thar gifragn ic, that  berhtun giscapu,
368 Mariun gimanodun *endi maht godes,
369 that iru an  sîða   ,
370 giboran an Bethleem barno strangost,
371 allaro cuningo craftigost: cuman  the mâreo,
372   manno lioht, sô is  managan dag
373 biliði uuârun endi  filu
374 giuuorðen an thesero uueroldi. Thô uuas it all giuuârod sô,
375 sô it êr spâha man gisprocan habdun,
376 thurh huilic ôdmôdi he thit erðrîki herod
377 thurh is selƀes craft sôkean uuelda,
378 managaro mundboro. Thô ina thiu môdar nam,
379 biuuand ina mid  uuîƀo ,
380 fagaron , endi ina mid  folmon tuuêm
381 legda lioƀlîco luttilna man,
382 that kind an êna , thoh he habdi craft godes,
383 manno drohtin. Thar  thiu môdar biforan,
384 uuîf uuacogeandi, uuar*doda selƀo,
385 held that hêlaga barn: ni uuas  hugi tuuîfli,
386 thera magað ira môdseƀo. Thô uuarð  managun cûð
387 oƀar thesa uuîdon uuerold,  antfundun,
388 thea thar ehuscalcos ûta uuârun,
389 uueros an uuahtu, uuiggeo ,
390 fehas aftar fel*da: gisâhun finistri an tuuê
391 telâtan an lufte, endi quam lioht godes
392 uuânum thurh thiu uuolcan endi thea uuardos thar
393 bifeng an them felda. Sie  an forhtun thô,
394 thea  an ira môda: gisâhun thar mahtigna
395 godes engil cuman, the im  sprac,
396 hêt that im thea uuardos uuiht ne antdrêdin
397 lêðes fon  liohta: ʽic scal euʼ,  , ʽlioƀara thing,
398  uuârlîco uuilleon seggean,
399 cûðean craft mikil: nu is Krist geboran
400 an theser*o selƀun naht, sâlig barn godes,
401 an  Dauides burg, drohtin the gôdo.
402 That is mendislo manno cunneas,
403 allaro firiho fruma. Thar gi ina fîðan mugun,
404 an  barno rîkiost:
405 hebbiad that te , that ic  tellean mag
406 uuârun uuordun, that he thar biuundan ligid,
407 that kind an ênera cribbiun, thoh he sî cuning oƀar al
408 erðun endi himiles endi oƀar ,
409 uueroldes uualdandʼ. Reht sô he thô that uuord gisprac,
410 sô uuarð thar engilo te them ênun unrîm cuman,
411 hêlag heriskepi fon heƀanuuanga,
412 fagar folc godes, endi filu sprâkun,
413 lofuuord manag liudeo hêrron.
414 Afhôƀun thô  sang, thô sie eft te heƀanuuanga
415 uundun thurh thiu uuolcan. Thea uuardos hôrdun,
416 huô thiu engilo craft alomahtigna god
417 suîðo  uuordun loƀodun:
418 ʽdiuriða sî nuʼ, quâðun sie, ʽdrohtine selƀun
419 an them hôhoston himilo rîkea
420 endi friðu an erðu firiho barnun,
421 gôduuilligun gumun,   god antkennead
422 thurh  hugi.ʼ Thea hirdios forstôdun,
423 that sie mahtig thing gimanod habda,
424  skepi: giuuitun im te Bethleem thanan
425 nahtes sîðon; uuas im niud mikil,
426 that sie  Krist gisehan .
427 Habda im the engil godes al giuuîsid
428 torhtun têcnun, that sie  selƀun,
429  them godes barne gangan mahtun,
430 endi fundun sân folco drohtin,
431 liudeo . Sagdun thô lof goda,
432 uualdande mid iro uuordun endi uuîdo 
433 oƀar thea berhtun burg, huilic im thar  uuarð
434 fon heƀanuuanga hêlag gitôgit,
435 fagar an felde. That  al biheld
436 an ira hugiskeftiun, hêlag ,
437 thiu magað an ira môde, sô huat sô siu gihôrda thea mann sprecan.
438 Fôdda ina thô fagaro frîho scâniosta,
439 thiu môdar thurh minnea managaro drohtin,
440 hêlag himilisc barn. Heliðos gisprâcun
441 an them ahtodon daga erlos managa,
442 suîðo glauua gumon mid thera godes thiornun,
443 that he Hêleand te namon hebbean scoldi,
444 sô it the godes engil Gabriel gisprac
445 uuâron uuordun endi them uuîƀe gibôd,
446 bodo drohtines, thô siu êrist that barn antfeng
447 uuânum te thesero uueroldi. Uuas iru uuilleo mikil,
448 that siu ina sô  haldan môsti,
449 fulgeng im thô sô gerno. That gêr furðor skrêd
450 untthat that friðubarn godes fiartig habda
451 dago endi nahto. Thô scoldun sie thar êna dâd frummean,
452 that sie ina te Hierusalem  scoldun
453 uualdanda te them uuîha.  uuas iro uuîsa than,
454 thero liudeo landsidu, that that ni môsta forlâtan negên
455 idis undar Ebreon, ef iru   uuarð
456 sunu afôdit, ne siu ina simbla 
457 te them godes uuîha forgeƀan scolda.
458 Giuuitun im thô thiu gôdun tuuê, Ioseph endi Maria
459 bêðiu fon Bethleem: habdun that barn mid im,
460 hêlagna Krist, sôhtun im hûs godes
461 an Hierusalem; thar scoldun sie is geld frummean
462 uualdanda  them uuîha uuîsa lêstean
463 Iudeo folkes. Thar fundun sea ênna gôdan man
464 aldan  them alaha, aðalboranan,
465  habda  them uuîha sô filu uuintro endi sumaro
466 gilibd an them liohta: oft uuarhta he thar lof goda
467 mid hluttru hugi; habda im hêlagna gêst,
468  seƀon; Simeon uuas he hêtan.
469 Im habda giuuîsid uualdandas craft
470 langa huîla, that he ni môsta  thit lioht ageƀan,
471 uuendean af thesero uueroldi, êr than im the uuilleo gistôdi,
472 that he  Krist gisehan môsti,
473 hêlagna heƀancuning. Thô uuarð im is hugi suîðo
474 blîði an is briostun, thô he gisah that  cuman
475 . ,
476 almahtigon gode, thes he ina mid is ôgun gisah.
477 Geng im thô tegegnes endi ina gerno antfeng
478 ald mid is armun: al antkende
479 bôcan endi biliði endi ôc that barn godes,
480 hêlagna heƀancuning. ʽNu ic thi, , scalʼ, quað he,
481 ʽgerno biddean, nu ic sus gigamalod bium,
482 that thu thînan holdan   hinan huerƀan lâtas,
483 an  faran, thar êr mîna forðrun dedun,
484 uueros fon thesero uueroldi, nu mi the uuilleo gistôd,
485 dago lioƀosto, that ic mînan drohtin gisah,
486 holdan hêrron, sô mi gihêtan uuas
487 langa huîla. Thu bist lioht mikil
488 allun elithiodun, thea êr thes alouualdon
489 craft ne antkendun. Thîna cumi sindun
490 te dôma endi te diurðon, drohtin frô mîn,
491 aƀarun Israhelas, êganumu folke,
492 thînun lioƀun *liudiun.ʼ Listiun talde thô
493 the aldo man an  alaha  thero gôdun,
494 sagda sôðlîco, huô iro sunu scolda
495 oƀar thesan middilgard managun uuerðan
496 sumun te falle, sumun te frôƀru firiho ,
497 them liudiun te leoƀa, the is lêrun gihôrdin,
498 endi them te harma, the hôrien ni 
499 Kristas lêron. ʽThu scalt nohʼ, quað he, ʽcara thiggean,
500 harm  herton, than ina heliðo barn
501 uuâpnun uuîtnod. That uuirðid thi uuerk mikil,
502 thrim te githolonna.ʼ Thiu thiorna al forstôd
503 uuîsas mannas uuord. Thô quam thar ôc ên uuîf gangan
504 ald innan  alaha: Anna uuas siu hêtan,
505 dohtar Fanueles; siu habde ira drohtine uuel
506 githionod te thanca, uuas iru  uuîf.
507 Siu môsta aftar ira magaðhêdi, sîðor siu mannes uuarð,
508 erles  eðili thiorne,
509 sô môsta siu mid ira brûdigumon  giuualdan
510 siƀun uuintar . Thô gifragn ic that iru thar sorga gistôd
511 that  thiu mikila maht metodes tedêlda,
512 uurêð . Thô uuas siu uuidouua aftar thiu
513  friðuuuîha fior endi 
514 uuintro an iro uueroldi, sô siu nia thana uuîh ni forlêt,
515 ac siu thar ira drohtine  dages endi nahtes,
516 gode thionode.  quam thar ôc gangan tô
517 an thea selƀun tîd: sân antkende
518 that  barn godes endi them  cûðde,
519 them uueroda aftar  uuîha uuilspel mikil,
520 quað that im neriandas ginist ginâhid uuâri,
521 helpa heƀencuninges: ʽnu is the hêlago Krist,
522 uualdand selƀo an thesan uuîh cuman
523 te  thea liudi, the hêr nu lango 
524 an thesara middilgard, managa huuîla,
525  thioda, sô nu thes thinges mugun
526 mendian .ʼ Manag fagonoda
527 uuerod aftar  uuîha: gihôrdun uuilspel mikil
528 fon gode seggean. That geld habde thô gilêstid
529 thiu idis an  alaha,  sô it im an ira êuua gibôd
530   thera  burg  giuuîsdun,
531 hêlagaro handgiuuerk. Giuuitun im thô te hûs thanan
532 fon Hierusalem Ioseph endi Maria,
533 hêlag hîuuiski: habdun im heƀenkuning
534  te gisîða, sunu drohtines,
535 managaro mundboron, sô it gio mâri ni uuarð
536 than uuîdor an thesaro uueroldi,  sô is uuilleo geng,
537 heƀencuninges hugi.
537 Thoh thar than  hêlag man
538 Krist antkendi, thoh ni uuarð it gio te thes kuninges hoƀe
539 them mannun gimârid, thea im an iro môdseƀon
540 holde ni uuârun, ac uuas im sô bihalden forð
541 mid uuordun endi mid uuerkun, antthat thar uueros ôstan,
542  glauua gumon gangan quâmun
543 threa te thero thiodu, thegnos snelle,
544  langan uueg oƀar that land tharod:
545 folgodun ênun berhtun  endi sôhtun that barn godes
546 mid hluttru hugi: uueldun im hnîgan tô,
547  im te iungrun: driƀun im godes giscapu.
548 Thô sie Erodesan thar rîkean fundun
549 an is seli sittien,  kuning,
550 môdagna mid is mannun: -  uuas he  gern -
551 thô quaddun sie ina cûsco an cuning,
552 fagaro an is flettie, endi he frâgoda sân,
553 huilic sie ârundi ûta ,
554 uueros an thana uuracsîð: ʽhuueðer lêdiad gi  gold
555 te geƀu huilicun gumuno? te huî gi  an ganga kumad,
556 gifaran an ? Huat, gi  ferran sind
557 erlos fon ôðrun thiodun. Ic  that gi sind eðili
558 cunnies fon cnôsle gôdun: nio hêr êr sulica cumana ni uurðun
559  fon ôðrun thiodun, sîðor ik môsta thesas erlo folkes,
560 giuualdan  uuîdon rîkeas. Gi sculun mi te uuârun seggean
561 for thesun liudio folke,  gi sîn te thesun lande ʼ.
562 Thô sprâcun im eft  gumon ôstronea,
563 uuordspâhe uueros: ʽuui thi te uuârun mugunʼ, quâðun sie,
564 ʽûse ârundi ôðo ,
565 giseggean sôðlîco,  uui quâmun an thesan sið herod
566 fon   thesaro erðu. Giu uuârun thar aðalies man,
567 gôdsprâkea gumon, thea ûs gôdes sô filu,
568 helpa gihêtun fon heƀencuninge
569 uuârum uuordun. Than uuas thar ên  man,
570 frôd endi filuuuîs - forn uuas that giu -,
571 ûse aldiro ôstar hinan, - thar ni uuarð sîðor ênig man
572 sprâkono sô  -;  mahte rekkien spel godes,
573   habde forliuuan liudio hêrro,
574 that he mahte fon erðu up gihôrean
575 uualdandes uuord: bithiu uuas is giuuit mikil,
576 thes  githâhti. Thô he thanan scolda,
577  gardos, gadulingo gimang,
578 forlâten liudio drôm, sôkien lioht ôðar,
579 thô   iungron hêt gangan nâhor,
580 erƀiuuardos, endi is erlun thô
581 sagde sôðlîco: - that al sîðor quam,
582 giuuarð* an thesaro uueroldi -:    that hêr scoldi cuman ên uuîscuning
583 mâri endi mahtig an thesan middilgard
584  bezton giburdies; quað that  scoldi uuesan barn godes,
585 quað that he thesero  uualdan scoldi
586 gio te êuuandaga, erðun endi himiles.
587 He quað that an them selƀon daga, the ina sâligna
588 an thesan middilgard môdar gidrôgi,
589 sô quað he that ôstana  scoldi skînan
590 himiltungal huît, sulic sô uui hêr ne habdin êr
591 undartuisc  endi himil ôðar huerigin,
592 ne sulic barn ne sulic bôcan. Hêt that thar te bedu fôrin
593 threa man fon thero thiodu, hêt sie thenkean uuel,
594 huan êr sie gisâuuin ôstana up ,
595 that godes bôcan gangan, hêt sie garuuuian sân,
596 hêt that uui im folgodin, sô it furi uurði,
597 uuestar oƀar thesa . Nu is it al giuuârod sô,
598 cuman thurh craft godes: the cuning is gifôdit,
599 giboran bald endi strang: uui gisâhun is bôcan skînan
600 hêdro fon himiles tunglun, sô ic uuêt, that it hêlag drohtin,
601 marcoda  selƀo. Uui gisâhun morgno gihuilikes
602 blîcan thana berhton sterron, endi uui gengun aftar them bôcna herod
603 uuegas endi uualdas huuîlon.  allaro uuilleono mêsta,
604 that uui ina , uuissin, huar uui  sôkean scoldin,
605 thana cuning  thesumu kêsurdôma. Saga ûs, undar huilicumu he sî thesaro cunneo afôdit.ʼ
606 Thô uuarð Erodesa innan briostun
607 harm uuið herta, bigan  is hugi uuallan,
608 seƀo mid sorgun: gihôrde seggean thô,
609 that he thar  êgan ,
610  cuning cunnies gôdes,
611  undar them gisîðea. Thô he samnon hêt,
612 sô huuat sô an Hierusalem gôdaro manno
613 allaro spâhoston sprâcono uuârun
614 endi an iro brioston bôkcraftes mêst
615 uuissun te uuârun, endi he sie mid  fragn,
616 suîðo niudlîco nîðhugdig man,
617 cuning thero liudio, huar Krist giboran
618 an uueroldrîkea uuerðan scoldi,
619 friðugumono bezt. Thô sprak im eft  angegin,
620 that uuerod uuârlîco, quâðun that sie uuissin garo,
621 that he scoldi an Bethleem giboran uuerðan: ʽsô is an  bôkun giscriƀan,
622 uuîslîco giuuritan, sô it uuârsagon,
623 suuîðo glauua gumon bi godes crafta
624  man furn gisprâcun,
625 that scoldi fon Bethleem burgo hirdi,
626 liof landes uuard an thit lioht cuman,
627 rîki râdgeƀo, the rihtien scal
628 Iudeono gumskepi endi   
629 mildi oƀar middilgard managun thiodun.ʼ
630  gifragn ic that sân aftar thiu slîðmôd cuning
631 thero uuârsagono uuord them uurekkiun sagda,
632 thea thar an  erlos uuârun
633 ferran gifarana, endi he frâgoda aftar thiu,
634 huan sie an ôstaruuegun êrist 
635 thana cuningsterron , cumbal luihtien
636 hêdro fon himile. Sie ni uueldun is im thô helen ,
637 ac sagdun it im sôðlîco. Thô hêt he sie an thana sîð faran,
638 hêt that sie ira ârundi al undarfundin
639 umbi thes kindes cumi, endi the cuning selƀo gibôd
640 suîðo hardlico, hêrro Iudeono,
641 them uuîsun mannun, êr than sie fôrin  forð,
642 that sie im eft gicûðdin, huar he thana cuning scoldi
643 sôkean  is ; quað that he thar uueldi mid is gisîðun tô,
644 bedan  barne. Than hogda he im te banon uuerðan
645 uuâpnes eggiun. Than eft uualdand god
646 thâhte uuið them thinga:  mahta  mêr,
647 gilêstean an thesum liohte: that is noh lango skîn,
648 gicûðid craft godes. Thô gengun eft thiu cumbl forð
649 uuânum undar . Thô uuârun thea uuîson man
650 fûsa te faranne: giuuitun  forð thanan
651 balda an bodskepi: uueldun that barn godes
652  sôkean. Sie ni habdun thanan gisîðeas mêr,
653  that sie thrie uuârun: uuissun im thingo giskêð,
654 uuârun im glauue gumon, the thea geƀa lêddun.
655 Than sâhun sie sô uuîslîco undar thana uuolcnes skion,
656 up te them hôhon himile, huô fôrun thea huuîton sterron
657 - antkendun sie  cumbal godes -,  uuârun thurh  herod
658 giuuarht te thesero uueroldi. Thea uueros aftar gengun,
659 folgodun ferahtlîco - sie frumide the mahte -
660 antthat  gisâhun, sîðuuôrige man,
661 berht bôcan godes, blêc an himile
662 stillo gistanden. The  liohto skên
663 huuît oƀar them hûse, thar that hêlage barn
664 uuonode an uuilleon endi ina that uuîf biheld,
665 thiu thiorne githiudo. Thô uuarð  thegno hugi
666 blîði an iro briostun: bi them bôcna forstôdun,
667 that sie that friðubarn godes funden habdun,
668 hêlagna heƀencuning. Thô sie an that hûs innan
669 mid iro geƀun gengun, gumon ôstronea,
670 sîðuuôrige man: sân antkendun
671 thea uueros uualdand Krist. Thea uurekkion fellun
672 te them kinde an kneobeda endi ina an cuninguuîsa
673 gôdan grôttun endi im thea geƀa drôgun,
674 gold endi  bi godes têcnun
675 *endi  thar . Thea man stôdun garouua,
676 holde for iro hêrron, thea it mid iro handun sân
677 fagaro . Thô giuuitun im thea  man,
678 seggi te selðon sîðuuôrige,
679 gumon an gastseli. Thar im godes engil
680 slâpandiun an naht  gitôgde,
681 gidrog  an drôme, al so it drohtin self,
682  uuelde,    that man im mid uuordun gibudi,
683 that sie im* thanan ôðran uueg, erlos fôrin,
684 liðodin sie te lande endi thana lêðan man,
685 Erodesan eft ni sôhtin,
686 môdagna cuning. Thô uuarð morgan cuman
687 uuânum te thesero uueroldi. Thô bigunnun thea uuîson man
688 seggean iro sueƀanos; selƀon antkendun
689 uualdandes uuord, huuand sie giuuit mikil
690 bârun an iro briostun: bâdun alouualdon,
691  heƀencuning, that sie môstin is huldi forð,
692 giuuirkean is uuilleon, quâðun that sea  im habdin giuuendit hugi,
693 * môd  . Thô  eft thie man thanan,
694 erlos ôstronie, al sô im the engil godes
695 uuordun giuuîsde: nâmun im uueg ôðran,
696 fulgengun godes lêrun: ni uueldun   cuninge
697 umbi thes barnes giburd bodon ôstronie,
698 sîðuuôrige man seggian ,
699 ac uuendun im eft an iro uuillion.
699 Thô uuarð sân aftar thiu uualdandes,
700 godes engil cumen Iosepe te ,
701 sagde im an suuefne slâpandium  naht,
702 bodo drohtines, that that barn godes
703 slîðmôd cuning sôkean uuelda,
704 âhtean is aldres; ʽnu  ine an Aegypteo
705 land  endi undar them luidiun uuesan
706 mid thiu godes barnu endi mid theru gôdan thior*nan,
707 uunon undar themu uuerode, untthat thi uuord 
708 hêrron thînes, that thu that hêlage barn
709 eft te thesum landscepi lêdian môtis,
710 drohtin thînen.ʼ Thô fon them drôma ansprang
711 Ioseph an is gestseli, endi that godes gibod
712 sân antkenda: giuuêt im an  sîð thanen
713 the thegan mid theru thiornon, sôhta im thiod ôðra
714 oƀar brêdan berg: uuelda that barn godes
715 fîundun antfôrian. *Thô gifrang aftar thiu
716 Erodes the cuning, thar he an is rîkea sat,
717  uuârun thea uuîson man uuestan gihuuorƀan
718 ôstar an iro ôðil endi fôrun im ôðran uueg:
719 uuisse  sie  that ârundi eft ni uueldun
720 seggian an is selðon. Thô  im  an sorgun hugi,
721 môd mornondi, quað that it  thie man dedin,
722 heliðos* te hônðun. Thô he  hriuuig sat,
723 balg ina an is briostun, quað that he is mahti  râd,
724  githenkien: ʽnu ic is aldar can,
725 uuêt is : nu ic giuuinnan mag,
726 that he  oƀar thesaro erðu ald ni uuirðit,
727  undar thesum heriscepi.ʼ Thô he sô hardo gibôd,
728 Erodes oƀar is riki, hêt thô is rinkos faran
729 cuning thero liudio, hêt that sie kinda sô filo
730 thurh iro handmagen hôƀdu binâmin,
731 sô manag barn umbi Bethleem, sô filo sô thar giboran uurði,
732 an tuêm  . Tionon frumidon
733  cuninges gisîðos. Thô scolda thar sô manag kindisc man
734  sundiono lôs. Ni uuarð sið  êr
735 giâmarlîcara forgang iungaro manno,
736 armlîcara dôð. Idisi uuiopun,
737 môdar managa, gisâhun iro megi spildian:
738 ni mahte siu im  giformon, thoh siu mid iro faðmon tuêm
739 iro êgan barn armun bifengi,
740 liof endi luttil, thoh scolda is  that lîf ,
741 the magu for theru môdar. Mênes ni sâhun,
742 uuîties thie uuamscaðon: uuâpnes eggiun
743 fremidun uuerc mikil. Fellun managa
744 maguiunge man. Thia môdar uuiopun
745 kindiungaro qualm. Cara uuas an Bethleem,
746 hofno hlûdost: thoh man  iro herton an tuê
747 sniði mid suerdu, thoh ni mohta im gio sêrara dâd
748 uuerðan an thesaro uueroldi, uuîƀun managun,
749 brûdiun an Bethleem: gisâhun iro barn biforan,
750 kindiunge man, qualmu sueltan
751  an iro barmun. Thie banon uuîtnodun
752 unsculdige scole: ni biscriƀun giouuiht
753 thea man umbi mênuuerk: uueldun mahtigna,
754 Krist selƀon aquellian. Than habde ina craftag god
755  uuið iro nîðe, that inan nahtes thanan
756 an Aegypteo land erlos ,
757 gumon mid Iosepe an thana  uuang,
758 an erðono beztun, thar ên aha fliutid,
759 Nîlstrôm mikil norð te sêuua,
760 flôdo fagorosta. Thar that friðubarn 
761 uuonoda an uuilleon, antthat uurd fornam
762 Erodes thana cuning, that he forlêt eldeo barn,
763 môdag manno drôm. Thô scolda thero marca giuuald
764 êgan is erƀiuuard: the uuas Archelâus
765 hêtan, heritogo helmberandero:
766 the scolda umbi Hierusalem Iudeono folkes,
767 uuerodes giuualdan. Thô uuarð uuord cuman
768 thar an Egypti eðiliun manne,
769 that  thar te Iosepe, godes engil sprac,
770 bodo drohtines, hêt ina eft that barn thanan
771 lêdien te lande. ʽnu haƀað thit lioht ʼ, quað he,
772 ʽErodes  cuning; he uuelde is âhtien giu,
773 frêson is ferahas. Nu maht thu   lêdien
774 that kind undar euua cunni, nu the cuning ni liƀod,
775 erl oƀarmôdig.ʼ Al antkende
776 Iosep godes têcan: geriuuide ina sniumo
777 the thegan mit thera thiornun, thô sie thanan uueldun
778 bêðiu mid thiu barnu: lêstun thiu berhton giscapu,
779 uualdandes uuillion, al sô he im  mid is uuordun gibôd.
780 Giuuitun im thô eft an  Ioseph endi Maria,
781 hêlag hîuuiski heƀencuninges,
782 uuârun im an Nazarethburg. Thar the neriondio Krist
783 uuôhs undar them uuerode,  giuuitties ful,
784 an uuas imu anst godes, he uuas allun liof
785 môdarmâgun: he ni uuas ôðrun mannun ,

787 tuueliƀi habde, thô uuarð thiu tîd cuman,
788 that  thar te Hierusalem, Iuðeo liudi
789 iro thiodgode thionon scoldun,
790 uuirkean is uuilleon. Thô uuarð thar an thana uuîh innan
791 thar te Hierusalem Iudeono gisamnod
792 mancraft mikil. Thar Maria uuas
793 self an gisîðea endi iru sunu habda,
794 godes  barn. Thô sie that geld habdun,
795 ,    ,
796 gilêstid te iro landuuîsun, thô fôrun im eft thie liudi thanan,
797 uueros an iro uuillion endi thar an them uuîha afstôd
798 mahtig barn godes, sô ina thiu môdar thar
799 ni uuissa te uuâron; ac siu uuânda that he mid them uueroda forð,
800 fôri mit iro friundun. Gifrang aftar thiu
801 eft  ôðrun daga aðalcunnies uuîf,
802 sâlig thiorna, that he undar them gisîðia ni uuas.
803 Uuarð Mariun thô môd an sorgun,
804 hriuuig umbi iro herta, thô siu that hêlaga barn
805 ni fand undar them folca: filu 
806 thiu godes thiorna. Giuuitun im thô eft te Hierusalem

808 an them uuîha innan, thar the  man,
809 suuîðo glauuua gumon  godes êuua

811 uuirkean mid iro uuordun them, the thesa uuerold giscôp.

813 Krist alouualdo, sô is thea ni mahtun antkennian uuiht,
814 the thes  thar uuardon scoldun,
815 endi frâgoda sie 
816 uuîsera uuordo. Sie uundradun alle,

818    . Thar ina thiu môdar fand
819 sittean under them  endi iro sunu ,

821 ʽhuuî uueldes thu thînera môdar, manno lioƀosto,

824 undar thesun burgliudiun?ʼ Thô sprac iru eft that barn angegin
825 uuîsun uuordun: ʽhuuat, thu uuêst garoʼ, ,

827 uuonon an uuilleon, thar giuuald haƀad

829 thie uueros an them uuîha, bihuuî he sô that uuord gisprac,

831  an ira breostun, sô huuat sô siu gihôrda ira barn sprecan

833 fon Hierusalem Ioseph endi Maria,
834 habdun im te gisîðea sunu drohtines,

839 thurh is ôdmôdi, aldron sînun:
840 ni uuelda an is kindiski thô noh is craft mikil
841 mannun mârean, that he sulic megin êhta,
842 giuuald an thesaro uueroldi, ac he im an is uuilleon bêd

848 uuord endi uuîsdôm ende allaro giuuitteo mêst,

860 auuahsan an ênero uuôstunni; thar ni uuas uuerodes than mêr,

863 manno .  uuarð im mahtig cuman

865 gôdlîc stemna , endi Johanne gibod,

874 uuatar an uuilleon, endi them uueroda allan dag,

880   sundea hreuuan,

890 an thana  gêst. That is hêrro oƀar al:
891 he mag allaro manno gihuuena mêngithâhteo,
892 sundeono sicoron, sô huene sô sô sâlig môt

895 gibioden barn godes. Ic bium an is kepi herod
896 an thesa uuerold cumen endi scal im thana uueg rûmien,
897 lêrean thesa liudi, huuô sea  iro gilôƀon haldan
898 thurh hluttran hugi, endi that sie an hellea ni thurƀin,
899 faran an fern that hêta. Thes uuirðid sô fagan an is môde
900 man te sô managaro , sô huue sô that mên forlâtid,
901 gerno thes gramon anbusni, - sô mag im thes gôdon giuuirkean,
902 huldi heƀencuninges, - sô huue sô haƀad hluttra treuua
903 up te them alomahtigon gode.ʼ Erlos managa
904 bi them lêrun thô, liudi uuândun,
905 uueros uuârlîco, that that uualdand Krist
906 selbo uuâri, huuanda he sô filu sôðes gisprac,
907 uuâroro uuordo. Thô uuarð that sô uuîdo cûð
908 oƀar that forgeƀana land gumono gihuuilicum,
909 seggiun  iro selðun: thô quâmun ina sôkean tharod
910 fon Hierusalem Iudeo 
911 bodon fon theru   , ef he uuâri that barn godes,
912 ʽthat hêr lango giuʼ, quaðun sie, ʽliudi sagdun,
913 uueros uuârlîco, that he scoldi an thesa uuerold cumanʼ.
914 Iohannes thô gimahalde endi tegegnes sprac
915 them bodun baldlîco: ʽni bium icʼ, quað he, ʽthat barn godes,
916 uuâr uualdand Krist, ac ic scal im thana uueg rûmien,
917 hêrron mînumu.ʼ Thea heliðos frugnun,
918 thea thar an them ârundie erlos uuârun,
919 bodon fon  : ʽef thu  ni bist that barn godes,
920 bist thu than thoh Elias, the hêr an êrdagun
921 uuas undar thesumu uuerode? He is 
922   thesan middilgard. Saga ûs huuat thu manno sîs!
923 Bist thu ênig , the hêr  uuâri
924  uuârsaguno? Huuat sculun uui them uuerode fon thi
925 seggean te sôðon? Neo hêr  ni uuarð
926 an  middilgard man  cuman
927 dâdiun sô mâri. Bihuuî thu hêr 
928  undar thesumu folke, ef thu tharo forasagono
929 ênhuuilic  bist?ʼ Thô habde eft garo
930 Iohannes the gôdo glau anduuordi:
931 ʽIc bium forabodo frâon mînes,
932 lioƀes hêrron; ic scal thit land recon,
933 thit  aftar is uuillion. Ic hebbiu fon is uuorde mid mi
934 stranga stemna, thoh sie hêr ni uuillie forstandan filo
935 uuerodes an thesaro uuôstunni. Ni bium ic mid uuihti 
936 drohtine mînumu: he is mid is dâdiun sô strang,
937 sô mâri endi sô mahtig - that uuirðid managun cûð,
938 uuerun aftar thesaro uueroldi - that ic thes uuirðig ni bium,
939 that ic môti an is giscuoha, thoh ic sî is  ,
940 an sô  drohtine, thea reomon antbindan:
941 sô mikilu is he betara than ic. Nis thes  gimaco
942 ênig oƀar erðu, ne nu aftar ni scal
943 uuerðan an thesaro uueroldi. Hebbiad euuan uuillion tharod,
944 liudi euuan gilôƀon: than eu  
945  euua hugi hrômag;  gi ,
946 forlâtad lêðaro drôm  sôkead eu lioht godes,
947 upôdes hêm,  rîki,
948 hôhan heƀenuuang. Ne lâtad euuan hugi tuuîflien!ʼ
949 Sô sprac thô iung gumo bi godes lêrun
950 mannun te mârðu. Manag 
951  te Bethania barn Israheles;
952 quâmun thar te Iohannese cuningo gisîðos,
953 liudi te lêrun endi iro gilôƀon antfengun.
954 He dôpte sie dago gihuuilikes endi im iro dâdi lôg,
955 uurêðaro uuillion, endi loƀode im uuord godes,
956 hêrron sînes: ʽHeƀenrîki uuirðidʼ, quað he,
957 ʽgaru gumono sô huuem, sô ti gode thenkid
958 endi an thana  *uuili hluttro ,
959 lêstean is lêraʼ. Thô ni uuas lang  thiu,
960 that im fon Galilea giuuêt godes êgan barn,
961 *diurlîc drohtines sunu, dôpi suokean.
962 Uuas im thuo an is uuastme uualdandes barn*,
963 al sô he mid thero thiodu thrîtig habdi
964 uuintro an is uueroldi. Thô he an is uuilleon ,
965 thar Iohannes an  strôme
966 allan  dag liudi manage
967 dôpte diurlîco.  sô he thô is drohtin gisah,
968 holden hêrron, sô uuarð im is hugi blîði,
969 thes im  uuilleo gistôd, endi sprac  mid is uuordun ,
970 :
971 ʽnu cumis thu te mînero dôpi, drohtin frô mîn,
972 thiod : sô scolde ic te thînero duan,
973 huuand thu bist allaro cuningo craftigost.ʼ Krist selƀo gibôd,
974 uualdand uuârlîco, that he ni sprâki thero uuordo than mêr:
975 ʽuuêst thu, that ûs  girîsidʼ, quað he, ʽallaro rehto 
976 te gifulleanne uuardes nu
977 an godes uuilleonʼ. Iohannes stôd,
978 dôpte allan dag druhtfolc mikil,
979 uuerod an uuatere endi  uualdand Krist,
980  heƀencuning handun sînun
981 an allaro  them  endi im thar te bedu gihnêg
982 an cneo craftag. Krist up giuuêt
983 fagar fon them flôde, friðubarn godes,
984 liof liudio uuard. Sô he thô that land ,
985 sô anthlidun thô himiles doru, endi quam the hêlago gêst
986 fon them alouualdon oƀane te Kriste:
987 - uuas im an gilîcnissie  fugles,
988 diurlîcara dûƀun - endi sat im uppan ûses drohtines ,
989  im oƀar them uualdandes barne. Aftar quam thar uuord fon himile,
990 hlûd fon them  radura  grôtta thane hêleand selƀon,
991 , allaro cuningo bezton, quað that he ina gicorana habdi
992 selƀo fon sînun rîkea, quað that im the sunu 
993 bezt allaro giboranaro manno, quað that he im uuâri allaro barno lioƀost.
994 That môste Iohannes , al sô it god uuelde,
995  endi gihôrean. He gideda it sân aftar thiu
996 mannun , that sie thar mahtigna
997 hêrron habdun:  isʼ, quað he, ʽheƀencuninges sunu,
998 ên alouualdand: thesas uuilleo ic urcundeo
999 uuesan an thesaro uueroldi,  it sagda mi uuord godes,
1000 drohtines stemne, thô he mi dôpean hêt
1001 uueros an uuatare, sô huuar sô ic gisâhi uuârlîco
1002 thana  gêst *fan heƀanuuange
1003 an  middilgard ênigan man uuaron,
1004 cuman mid craftu; that quað,  scoldi Crist uuesan,
1005 diurlîc drohtines suno. Hie dôpean scal
1006 an thana* hêlagan gêst* endi hêlean managa
1007 manno mêndâdi. He haƀad  fon gode,
1008 that he alâtan mag liudeo gihuuilicun
1009 saca endi sundea. Thit is selƀo Krist,
1010 godes êgan barn, gumono bezto,
1011 friðu uuið fîundun. Uuala that eu thes mag frâhmôd hugi
1012 uuesan an thesaro uueroldi, thes eu the uuilleo gistôd,
1013 that gi sô  thana landes uuard
1014 selƀon gisâhun. Nu môt  sundeono lôs
1015 manag gêst faran an godes uuilleon
1016 tionon atômid, the mid treuuon uuili
1017 uuið is uuini uuirkean endi an uualdand Krist
1018 fasto gilôƀean. That scal te  uuerðen
1019 gumono sô huuilicun, sô that gerno dôtʼ.
1020 Sô gefragn ic that  gumono gihuuilicun,
1021 loƀoda them liudiun lêra Kristes,
1022 hêrron sines, endi heƀenrîki
1023 te giuuinnanne, uuelono thane mêston,
1024 sâlig sinlîf. Thô he  selƀo giuuêt
1025 ,
1026 an êna uuôstunnea, uualdandes sunu;
1027 uuas im thar an thero ênôdi erlo drohtin
1028 lange huuîla; ne habda liudeo than mêr,
1029 seggeo te gisîðun, al sô he im selƀo gicôs:
1030 uuelda is thar lâtan  craftiga uuihti,
1031 selƀon , the gio an sundea spenit,
1032 man an mênuuerk: he consta is môdseƀon,

1041 hôh himilrîki: bethiu he herod hêlagna bodon,
1042 is sunu . That uuas 
1043  an is hugi: afonsta heƀanrîkies

1045 mid them selƀon sacun sunu drohtines,

1053  fiortig nahto,

1066 allaro barno bezt, brôd af thesun stênun?
1067  thînna hungar.ʼ Thô sprac  the hêlago Crist:
1068 ʽni mugun ʼ, quað he, ʽ brôdes,
1069 liudi libbien, ac sie sculun thruh lêra godes

1074 that fon uualdandes uuorde gebiudid.ʼ
1075 Thô bigan eft niuson endi nâhor geng
1076 unhiuri fîund  sîðu,
1077 fandoda is frôhan. That friðubarn tholode

1086 an bôcun geuuriten, huuô giboden haƀad
1087 is engilun alomahtig fader,
1088 that sie thi at  gehuuem uuardos sinðun,
1089 haldad thi undar iro handun. Huuat, thu huuargin ni tharft
1090 mid thînun fôtun an felis bespurnan,
1091 an hardan stên.ʼ  sprac eft the hêlago Crist,

1094 fandon thînes frôhan: that nis thi allaro frumono .ʼ

1096 gibrengen uppan  hôhon: thar ina the

1300 sagde im thô te , quað that thie sâliga uuârin,
1301 man an thesoro middil, thie hêr an iro  uuârin
1302 arme thurh : ʽthem is that  rîki,
1303 suuîðo hêlaglîc an heƀanuuange
1304 sinlîf fargeƀen.ʼ Quað that ôc sâlige uuârin
1305 mâðmundie man: ʽthie môtun thie mârion erðe,
1306  that selƀe rîki.ʼ Quað  ôc sâlige uuârin,
1307 thie hîr  iro uuammun dâdi; ʽthie môtun eft uuillion gebîdan,
1308 frôfre . Sâlige sind ôc, the sie hîr frumono ,
1309 rincos, that  rehto adômien. Thes môtun sie uuerðan an them rîkia drohtines
1310 gifullit thurh iro ferhton dâdi: sulîcoro môtun sie frumono 
1311 thie rincos, thie hîr rehto , ne uuilliad an  besuuîcan
1312 man, thar sie  mahle . Sâlige sind ôc them hîr mildi uuirðit
1313 hugi an heliðo briostun: them uuirðit the hêlego drohtin,
1314 mildi mahtig selƀo. Sâlige sind ôc undar thesaro managon thiodu,

1724 . Sulic sint hîr folc manag,

2018 Cristes môder: geng uuið iro kind sprecan,
2019 uuið iro sunu selƀon, sagda im mid uuordun,
2020 that thea uuerdos thô mêr uuînes ne habdun
2021 them gestiun te . Siu thô gerno bad,
2022 that is the hêlogo Crist helpa geriedi
2023 themu uuerode te uuilleon. Thô habda  is uuord garu
2024 mahtig barn godes endi uuið is môder sprac:

2026 umbi theses uuerodes uuîn? Te huî sprikis thu thes, uuîf, sô filu,
2027 manos mi far thesoro menigi? Ne sint mîna noh
2028  cumana.ʼ Than thoh 
2029 an iro hugiskeftiun, hêlag thiorne,
2030 that is aftar them uuordun uualdandes barn,
2031 hêleandoro bezt helpan uueldi.
2032 Hêt thô thea ambahtman idiso scôniost,
2033 skenkeon endi scapuuardos, thea thar scoldun thero scolu thionon,
2034 that sie thes ne uuord ne uuerc uuiht ne farlêtin,

2036 lêstean far them liudiun. Lârea stôdun thar
2037 stênfatu sehsi. Thô sô stillo gebôd
2038 mahtig barn godes, sô it thar manno filu
2039 ne uuissa te uuârun, huô he it mid  uuordu gesprac;
2040 he hêt thea skenkeon thô skîreas uuatares
2041 thiu fatu fullien, endi hi thar mid is fingrun thô,
2042 segnade selƀo sînun handun,
2043 uuarhte it te uuîne endi hêt is an ên uuêgi hlaðen,
2044 skeppien mid ênoro scâlon, endi thô te them skenkeon sprac,
2045 hêt  thero gesteo, the at them gômun uuas
2046 themu hêroston an hand geƀan,
2047 ful mid folmun, themu the thes folkes thar
2048 geuueld aftar themu . Reht sô  thes uuînes gedranc,
2049 sô ni mahte he bemîðan, ne hi far theru menigi sprac
2050 te themu brûdigumon, quað that simbla that bezte lîð
2051 alloro erlo gehuilic êrist scoldi
2052 geƀan at is gômun: ʽundar thiu uuirðid  gumono hugi
2053 auuekid mid uuînu, that sie uuel blîðod,
2054 druncan drômead. Than mag man thar dragan aftar thiu
2055  lîð: sô ist thesoro liudeo thau.
2056 Than haƀas thu nu uunderlîco uuerdskepi thînan
2057 gemarcod far thesoro menigi: hêtis far thit manno folc
2058 alles thînes uuînes that uuirsiste
2059 thîne ambahtman êrist brengean,
2060 geƀan  thînun gômun. Nu sint thîna gesti sade,
2061 sint thîne druhtingos druncane suîðo,
2062 is thit folc : nu hêtis thu hîr forð dragan
2063 alloro lîðo lofsamost, thero 
2064 huergin hebbean. Mid thius scoldis thu ûs hindag êr
2065 geƀon endi gômean: than it alloro gumono gehuilic
2066 gethigedi te thanke.ʼ Thô uuarð thar thegan manag
2067 geuuar aftar them uuordun, sîðor sie thes uuînes gedruncun,
2068 that  the hêlogo Crist an themu hûse innan
2069 têcan uuarhte: trûodun sie sîðor
2070 thiu mêr an is mundburd, that hi  maht godes,
2071 geuuald an thesoro uueroldi. Thô uuarð that sô uuîdo cûð
2072 oƀar  Iudeo liudiun,
2073 huô thar selƀo gededa sunu drohtines
2074 uuater te uuîne: that uuarð thar uundro êrist,
2075 thero  hi thar an Galilea Iudeo ,
2076 têcno getôgdi. Ne mag  getellean man,
2077 geseggean te sôðan, huat thar sîðor uuarð
2078 uundres undar themu uuerode, thar uualdand Crist
2079 an godes namon Iudeo liudeon
2080 allan langan dag lêra sagde,
2081 gihêt im  endi helleo gethuing
2082 uueride mid uuordun, hêt sie uuara godes,
2083 sinlîf sôkean: thar is seolono lioht,
2084 drôm drohtines endi dagskîmon,
2085 gôd godes; thar gêst manag
2086 uunod an uuillean, the hîr uuel thenkid,
2087 that he hîr bihalde heƀencuninges gebod.
2088 Geuuêt imu thô mid is iungoron fan them gômun 
2089 Kristus te Capharnaum, cuningo rîkeost,
2090 te theru mâreon burg. Megin samnode,
2091 gumon imu tegegnes, gôdoro 
2092 sâlig gesîði: uueldun thiu  suôtean uuord
2093 hêlag  im ên hunno quam,
2094 ên gôd man angegin endi ina gerno bad
2095 helpan hêlagne, quað that hi undar is hîuuiskea
2096 ênna lefna  lango habdi,
2097 seocan an is selðon: ʽsô ina ênig seggeo ne mag
2098 handun gehêlien. Nu is im thînoro helpono tharf,
2099 frô mîn the gôdo.ʼ Thô sprac im eft that friðubarn godes
2100 sân aftar thiu selƀo tegegnes,
2101 quað that he thar quâmi endi that kind 
2102 nerean  theru nôdi. Thô im nâhor geng
2103 the man far theru menigi uuið sô mahtigna

2106 sôkeas mîna seliða, huand ic bium sô sundig man

2108 that thu ina  maht hêlan geuuirkean,
2109 uualdand frô mîn: ef thu it mid  gesprikis,
2110 than is sân thiu lêfhêd lôsot endi uuirðid is lîchamo

2112 Ic bium mi ambahtman, hebbiu mi ôdes genôg,
2113 uuelono geuunnen: thoh ic undar geuueldi sî
2114 aðalcuninges,  hebbiu ic erlo getrôst,
2115 holde heririncos, thea mi sô gehôriga sint,
2116 that sie thes ne uuord ne uuerc uuiht ne farlâtad,

2119 holde te iro hêrron. Thoh ic at mînumu hûs êgi
2120 uuîdbrêdene uuelon endi uuerodes genôg,
2121 heliðos hugiderƀie,  ni gidar ic thi sô hêlagna
2122 biddien, barn godes, that thu an mîn bû gangas,
2123 sôkeas mîna seliða, huand ic sô sundig bium,
2124 uuêt mîna faruurhti.ʼ Thô sprac eft uualdand Crist,
2125 the gumo uuið is iungoron, quað that hi an Iudeon huergin
2126 undar Israheles aƀoron ne fundi
2127 gemacon thes mannes, the io mêr te gode
2128 an themu landskepi gelôƀon habdi,
2129  hluttron te himile: ʽnu lâtu ic iu thar hôrien tô,

2132 mancunnies cuman manag tesamne,

2134 thea motun thar an Abrahames endi an Isaakes sô self
2135 endi  an Iacobes, gôdoro manno,
2136 barmun restien endi bêðiu

2139 theses rîkeas suni berôƀode uuerðen,

2142 Thar mag man gehôrien heliðos quîðean,

2144 thar ist  endi grâdag fiur,
2145 hard , hêt endi thiustri,
2146  sinnahti sundea te lône,

2148 that he  alôsie, êr hi thit lioht ageƀe,
2149 uuendie fan thesoro uueroldi. Nu maht thu thi an thînan uuilleon forð
2150 sîðon te selðun; than findis thugesundat hûs
2151 magoiungan man: môd is imu an luston,
2152 that barn is gehêlid, sô thu bêdi te mi:
2153 it uuirðid al sô gelêstid, sô thu gelôƀon haƀas

2156 thanc for thero thiodo,  he imu at sulicun tharƀun halp.

2158 sâliglîco: giuuêt imu an thana sîð thanan,

2375 mârean huat he mênde. Thar ina megin umbi,
2376 thioda thrungun: uuas im  mikil
2377 te gihôrienne heƀencuninges
2378 uuârfastun uuord. He stôd imu thô bi ênes uuatares staðe,
2379 ni uuelde thô bi themu gethringe oƀar that thegno folc
2380 an themu lande uppan thea lêra cûðean,

2382 friðubarn godes, themu flôde nâhor
2383 an ên skip innan, endi it scalden hêt
2384 lande rûmur, that ina thea liudi sô filu,
2385 thioda ni thrungi. Stôd thegan manag,
2386 uuerod bi themu uuatare, thar uualdand Crist
2387 oƀar that liudio folc lêra sagde:
2388 ʽhuat, ik iu seggean magʼ, quað he, ʽgesîðos mîne,
2389 huô imu ên erl bigan an erðu 
2390  mid is handun. Sum it an  stēn
2391 uuardan fel, erðon ni habda,
2392 that it  mahti uuahsan eftha  gifâhan,
2393 kînan eftha biclîƀen, ac uuarð that corn farloren,
2394 . Sum it eft an land bifel,
2395 an erðun aðalcunnies: bigan imu aftar thiu
2396 uuahsen uuânlîco endi uurteo fâhan,
2397  an lustun: uuas that land sô gôd,
2398 frânisco gifehod. Sum it eft bifallen uuarð
2399 an êna starca strâtun, thar stôpon gengun,
2400 hrosso hôfslaga endi heliðo ;
2401 ,
2402 bigan imu an themu uuege uuahsen; thô it eft thes uuerodes farnam,
2403 thes folkes fard mikil endi fuglos alâsun,
2404 that  themu êcsan uuiht aftar ni môste
2405 uuerðan te uuillean, thes thar an thene uueg bifel.
2406 Sum uuarð it than bifallen, thar sô filu stôdun
2407  thorno an themu dage;
2408 uuarð imu thar an erðu endi eft up gigeng,
2409 kên imu thar endi . Thô  eft crûd an gimang,
2410 uueridun imu thene uuastom: habda it thes uualdes hlea
2411 forana , that it ni  te ênigaro frumu uuerðen,
2412 ef  thea thornos sô thringan .ʼ
2413 Thô sâtun endi suîgodun gesîðos Cristes,
2414 uuordspâha uueros: uuas im uundar mikil,
2415 be huilicun biliðiun that barn godes
2416 sulic sôðlîc spel seggean bigunni.
2417 Thô bigan is thero erlo ên frâgoian
2418 holdan hêrron, hnêg imu tegegnes
2419 tulgo uuerðlico: ʽhuat, thu geuuald haƀasʼ, ,
2420 ʽia an , hêlag drohtin,
2421 , bist thu alouualdo
2422 gumono gêsto, endi uui thîne iungaron sind,
2423 an  hugi holde. Hêrro the gôdo,
2424 ef it thîn uuilleo sî, lât ûs thînaro uuordo thar
2425 endi gihôrien, that uui it aftar thi
2426  al cristinfolc cûðean môtin.
2427 Uui uuitun that thînun uuordun uuârlîc biliði
2428 forð folgoiad, endi ûs is firinun tharf,
2429 that uui thîn uuord endi thîn uuerk, - huand  fan sulicumu geuuittea cumid -
2430 that uui it an thesumu  lînon môtin.ʼ
2431 Thô im eft tegegnes gumono bezta
2432 anduuordi gesprak: ʽni mênde ik elcor uuihtʼ, 
2433 ʽte bidernienne dâdio mînaro,
2434 uuordo eftha uuerco; thit sculun gi  alle,
2435 iungaron mîne, huand iu fargeƀen haƀad
2436 uualdand thesaro uueroldes, that gi uuitan môtun
2437 an iuuuom hugiskeftiun  gerûni;
2438 them ôðrun scal man be biliðiun that gibod godes
2439 uuordun uuîsien. Nu uuilliu ik iu te uuârun hier
2440 mârien, huat ik mênde, that gi mîna thiu bet
2441 oƀar al thit landskepi lêra farstandan.
2442 That sâd, that ik iu sagda, that is selƀes uuord,
2443 thiu hêlaga lêra heƀencuninges,
2444 huô man thea mârien scal oƀar  middilgard,
2445 uuîdo aftar thesaro uueroldi. Uueros sind im gihugide,
2446 man mislîco: sum  môd dregid,
2447 harda hugiskefti endi hrêan seƀon,
2448 that ina ni geuuerðod, that he it be iuuuon uuordun 
2449 that he  mîna lêra forð lêstien uuillie,
2450 ac uuerðad thar sô farlorana lêra mîna,
2451 godes ambusni endi iuuuaro gumono uuord

2453 that that korn faruuarð, that thar mid kîðun ni mahte
2454 an themu stêne uppan stedihaft uuerðan.
2455 Sô uuirðid al farloran eðilero sprâka,
2456 ârundi godes, sô huat sô man themu uƀilon manne
2457 uuordun geuuîsid, endi  an thea uuirson hand,
2458 undar fîundo folc fard gekiusid,
2459 an godes unuuilean endi an gramono hrôm
2460 endi an fiures . Forð scal he 
2461 mid is breosthugi brêda logna.
2462 Nio gi an thesumu lande thiu lês lêra mîna
2463 uuordun ni uuîsiad: is theses uuerodes sô filu,
2464 erlo aftar thesaro erðun: bistêd thar ôðar man,
2465 the is  endi glau, - endi haƀad imu gôdan môd -,

2470 lînod endi lêstid: is is gilôƀo sô gôd,
2471 talod imu, huô he ôðrana eft gihuerƀie
2472 dâdigan man, that is môd draga
2473 hluttra treuua te heƀencuninge.
2474 Than brêdid an thes breostun that gibod godes,
2475 thie luƀigo gilôbo, sô an themu lande duod

2477 endi imu thiu  bihagod ,
2478 regin endi sunne, that it is reht haƀad.
2479 Sô duod thiu godes lêra an themu gôdun manne

2487 mid is hugiskeftiun himilrîkeas gidêl,

2538 Sô uuîsda hie thuo mid uuordon, stuod uuerod mikil
2539 umbi that barn godes, gehôrdun ina bi biliđon filo

2544 fagares fruhtes. Thuo geng thar is fîond aftar
2545 thuru dernian hugi, endi it all mid durðu oƀarsêu,
2546 mid uueodo  Thuo uuôhsun sia bêðiu,
2547 ge that corn ge that crûd. Sô quâmun gangan
2548 is hagastoldos te hûs, iro hêrren sagdun,

2553 Thuo sprak eft thie aðales man them erlon tegegnes,
2554 thiodan uuið is thegnos, quat that hie it  undarthenkian uuel,

2558 is iungron tegegnes, quâðun that sia thar uueldin gangan tuo,
2559 cuman mid craftu endi lôsian that crûd thanan,

2561 ʽne uuelleo ik, that gi it uuiodonʼ, quathie, ʽhuand gi biuuardon ni mugun,
2562 gigômean an iuuuon gange, thoh gi it gerno ni duan,
2563 ni gi thes cornes te filo, kîðo auuerdiat,
2564 felliat under iuuua fuoti. Lâte man sia forð hinan
2565 bêðiu uuahsan, und êr beuuod cume
2566 endi an them felde sind fruhti rîpia,

2731 an lioht cuman. Sô uuas thero liudio thau,

2733 Iudeono mid gômun. Thô uuarð thar an thene gastseli
2734 megincraft mikil manno gesamnod,
2735  an that hûs, thar iro hêrro uuas
2736 an is kuningstôle. Quâmun managa
2737 Iudeon an thene gastseli; uuarð im thar gladmôd hugi,
2738 blîði an iro breostun: gisâhun iro bâggeƀon
2739 uuesen an uunneon. Drôg man uuîn an flet
2740 skîri mid scâlun, skenkeon huurƀun,
2741 gengun mid goldfatun: gaman uuas thar inne
2742 hlûd an thero hallu, heliðos drunkun.
2743 Uuas thes an lustun landes hirdi,
2744 huat he themu uuerode mêst te uunniun 
2745 Hêt he thô gangen forð gêla thiornun,
2746 is brôder barn, thar he an is benki sat
2747 uuînu giuulenkid, endi thô te themu uuîbe sprac;
2748 grôtte sie fora themu gumskepie endi gerno bad,
2749 that siu thar fora them gastiun gaman afhôƀi
2750 fagar an flettie: ʽlât thit folc sehan,
2751 huô  gelînod haƀas liudio menegi
2752 te  benkiun; ef thu  bede ,
2753 mîn uuord for thesumu uuerode, than uuilliu ik it hêr te uuârun 
2754 liahto fora thesun liudiun endi ôk gilêstien sô,
2755 that ik thi than aftar thiu êron uuilliu,
2756 sô hues sô thu mi bidis for thesun mînun bâguuiniun:
2757 thoh thu mi thesaro heridômo halƀaro fergos,
2758 rîkeas mînes,  that it ênig rinko ni mag
2759 uuordun giuuendien, endi it scal giuuerðen sô.ʼ
2760 Thô uuarð thera magað aftar thiu môd gihuorƀen,
2761 hugi aftar iro hêrron, that siu an themu hûse innen,
2762 an themu gastseli gamen up ahuof,
2763 al sô thero liudio landuuîse gidrôg,
2764 thero thiodo thau. Thiu thiorne spilode
2765 hrôr aftar themu hûse: hugi uuas an lustun,
2766  môdseƀo. Thô thiu magað habda
2767 githionod te thanke thiodcuninge
2768 endi allumu themu erlskepie,  thar inne uuas
2769 gôdaro gumono, siu uuelde thô ira geƀa êgan,
2770 thiu magað for theru menegi: geng thô uuið iro môdar sprekan
2771 endi frâgode sie firiuuitlîco,
2772 hues siu thene  uuard biddien scoldi.
2773 Thô uuîsde siu aftar iro uuilleon, hêt that siu uuihtes than êr
2774 ni gerodi for themu gumskepie,  that man iru Iohannes
2775 an theru hallu innan hôƀid gâƀi
2776 alôsid  is lîchamon. That uuas allun them liudiun harm,
2777 them mannun an iro môde, thô sie  gihôrdun thea magað sprekan;
2778 sô uuas it ôk themu kuninge: he ni mahte is quidi liagan,
2779 is uuord uuendien: hêt thô is uuêpanberand
2780 gangen fan themu gastseli endi hêt thene godes man
2781 lîƀu bilôsien. Thô ni uuas lang te thiu,
2782 that man an thea halla hôƀid brâhte
2783 thes thiodgumon, endi it thar theru thiornun fargaf,
2784 magað for theru menegi: siu drôg it theru môder forð.
2785 Thô uuas êndago allaro manno
2786 thes uuîsoston,  an thesa uuerold ,
2787 thero the quene ênig kind ,
2788 idis fan erle, lêt man simla then  biforan,
2789 the thiu thiorne ,  gio thegnes ni uuarð
2790 uuîs an iro uueroldi,  sô ine uualdand god
2791 fan heƀenuuange hêlages gêstes
2792 gimarcode mahtig: the ni habde  gimacon huergin
2793 êr nec aftar. Erlos huurƀun,
2794 gumon umbi , is iungaron managa,
2795 sâlig gesîði, endi ine an sande bigrôƀun,
2796 leoƀes lîchamon: uuissun that he lioht godes,
2797 diurlîcan  mid is drohtine [samad,
2798 upôdas hêm] êgan môste,
2799 sâlig sôkean.
2799 Thô geuuitun im thea gesîðos thanen,
2800  giungaron giâmermôde,
2801 hêlagferaha: uuas im iro hêrron dôđ
2802 suîðo an sorgun. Geuuitun im 
2803 an theru uuôstunni uualdandes sunu,
2804 craftigana Crist endi imu kûð gidedun
2805 gôdes mannes forgang, huô habde the Iudeono kuning
2806  mâreostan mâkeas eggiun
2807 hôƀdu bihauuuan: he ni uuelde  harm spreken,
2808 sunu drohtines; he uuisse that thiu seole uuas
2809 hêlag gihalden uuiðer hettiandeon,
2810 an friðe uuiðer fîundun. Thô  gifrâgi uuarð
2811 aftar them  lêreandero bezt
2812 an theru uuôstunni: uuerod samnode,
2813  uuas im firiuuit mikil
2814 uuîsaro uuordo; imu uuas ôk uuilleo 
2815  drohtines, that he sulic gesîðo folc
2816 an that lioht godes  môsti,
2817 uuennien mid uuilleon. Uualdand lêrde
2818 allan langan dag liudi managa,
2819 elitheodige man, anttat an âƀand sêg
2820 sunne te sedle. Thô gengun is gesîðos tueliƀi,
2821 gumon te themu godes barne endi sagdun iro gôdumu hêrron,

2823 uueros an themu uuôsteon lande: ʽsie ni mugun sie hêr mid uuihti anthebbien,
2824 heliðos bi  gethuinge. Nu lât thu sie, hêrro the gôdo,
2825 sîðon, thar sie seliða fîðen. Nâh sind hêr gesetana burgi
2826 managa mid meginthiodun: thar fîðad sie meti te kôpe,
2827 uueros aftar them uuîkeon.ʼ Thô sprak eft uualdand Crist,
2828  drohtin, quað that thes êniga thurufti ni uuârin,
2829 ʽthat sie thurh metilôsi mîna farlâtan
2830 leoƀlîca lêra. Geƀad gi thesun liudiun ginôg,
2831 uuenniad sie hêr mid uuilleon.ʼ Thô habde  is uuord garu
2832 Philippus frôd gumo, quað that thar sô filu uuâri
2833 manno menigi: ʽthoh uui hêr te meti habdin
2834 garu im te geƀanne, sô uui mahtin fargelden mêst,
2835 ef uui hêr gisaldin siluƀerscatto
2836 tuê hund samad, tueho uuâri is noh than,
2837 that iro ênig thar  ginâmi:
2838 sô luttic uuâri that thesun liudiun.ʼ Thô sprak eft the landes uuard
2839 endi frâgode sie firiuuitlîco,
2840 manno drohtin,  sie thar te meti habdin
2841  geuunnin. Thô sprak imu eft mid is uuordun angegin
2842 Andreas fora them erlun endi themu alouualdon
2843 selƀumu sagde, that sie an iro gisîðie than mêr
2844 garouues ni habdin,  girstin brôd
2845 fîƀi an ûsaru ferdi endi fiscos tuêne.
2846 Huat mag that thoh thesaru menigi?ʼ Thô sprac  eft mahtig Krist,
2847 the gôdo godes sunu, endi hêt that gumono folc
2848 skerien endi skêðen endi hêt thea scola settien,
2849 erlos aftar theru , irminthioda
2850 an grase gruonimu, endi thô te is iungarun sprak,
2851 allaro barno bezt, hêt imu thiu brôd halon
2852 endi thea fiscos forð. That folc stillo bêd,
2853 sat gesîði mikil; undar thiu he thurh is selƀes craft,
2854 manno drohtin, thene meti uuîhide,
2855 hêlag heƀencuning,  mid is handun brak,
2856 gaf it is iungarun forð, endi  sie undar themu gumskepie 
2857 dragan endi dêlien. Sie lêstun iro drohtines uuord,
2858 is geƀa  gumono gihuemu,
2859 hêlaga helpa.  undar iro handun uuôhs,
2860 meti manno gihuemu: theru meginthiodu uuarð
2861 lîf an lustun, thea liudi uurðun alle,
2862 sade sâlig folc, sô huat sô thar gisamnod uuas
2863 fan allun uuîdun uuegun. Thô hêt uualdand Krist
2864 gangen is iungaron endi hêt sie gômien uuel,
2865 that thiu lêƀa thar farloren ni uurði;
2866 hêt sie thô samnon, thô thar sade uuârun
2867 mankunnies manag. Thar môses uuarð,
2868 brôdes te lêƀu, that man birilos gilas
2869 tueliƀi fulle: that uuas têcan mikil,
2870 grôt craft godes, huand thar uuas gumono gitald
2871 âno uuîf endi kind,  atsamme
2872 fîf thûsundig. That folc al farstôd,
2873 thea man an iro môde, that sie thar mahtigna
2874 hêrron habdun. Thô sie heƀencuning,
2875 thea liudi loƀodun, quâðun that gio ni uurđi an thit lioht cuman
2876 uuîsaro uuârsago, eftha  he giuuald mid gode
2877 an thesaru middilgard mêron habdi,
2878  hugi. Alle gisprâkun,
2879 that he uuâri uuirðig uuelono gehuilikes,
2880 that he erðrîki êgan môsti,
2881 uuîdene  ʽnu he sulic geuuit haƀad,
2882 sô grôte craft mid gode.ʼ Thea gumon alle giuuarð,
2883 that sie ine gihôƀin te hêrosten,
2884 gikurin ine te cuninge: that Kriste ni uuas
2885 uuihtes uuirðig, huand he thit uueroldrîki,
2886 erðe endi uphimil thurh is ênes craft
2887 selƀo giuuarhte endi sîðor 
2888 land endi , - thoh thes ênigan gilôƀon ni dedin
2889 uurêðe uuiðersacon - that al an is giuualde stâd,
2890 cuningrîkeo craft endi kêsurdômes,
2891 meginthiodo mahal. Bethiu ni uuelde he  thero manno sprâka
2892 hebbian ênigan hêrdôm, hêlag drohtin,
2893 uueroldkuninges namon; ni  thô mid uuordun 
2894  uuið that folc furður, ac fôr imu thô, 
2895 an ên gebirgi uppan: flôh that barn godes
2896 gêlaro gelpquidi endi is iungaron hêt
2897 oƀar ênne sêo sîðon endi im selƀo gibôd,
2898 huar sie im eft tegegnes gangen scoldin.
2899 Thô telêt that liuduuerod aftar themu lande allumu,
2900 tefôr folc mikil, sîðor iro frâho giuuêt
2901 an that gebirgi uppan, barno rîkeost,
2902 uualdand an is uuilleon. Thô te thes uuatares staðe
2903 samnodun thea gesîðos Cristes, the he imu habde selƀo gicorane,
2904 sie tueliƀi thurh iro treuua gôda: ni uuas im tueho nigiean,
2905 neƀu sie an  godes thionost gerno uueldin
2906 oƀar thene sêo sîðon. Thô lêtun  strôm,
2907  hluttron ûðeon,
2908 skêðan  uuater. Skrêd lioht dages,
2909  uuarð an sedle; the 
2910 naht  biuuarp; nâðidun erlos
2911 forðuuardes an flôd; uuarð thiu fiorðe tid
2912 thera nahtes cuman -  Crist
2913 uuarode  thô uuarð uuind mikil,
2914 hôh uueder  hlamodun ûðeon,
2915  an  strîdiun feridun
2916 thea uueros uuiðer uuinde, uuas im uurêð hugi,
2917 seƀo sorgono ful: selƀon ni uuândun
2918  an land cumen
2919 thurh thes uuederes geuuin. Thô gisâhun sie uualdand Krist
2920 an themu sêe uppan selƀun gangan,
2921 faran an fâðion: ni mahte an thene flôd innan,
2922 an thene sêo sincan, huand ine is selƀes craft
2923 hêlag anthabde. Hugi uuarð an forhtun,
2924 thero  môdseƀo: andrêdun that it im mahtig fîund
2925 te  dâdi. Thô sprak im iro drohtin tô,
2926 hêlag heƀencuning, endi sagde im that  iro hêrro uuas
2927 mâri endi mahtig: ʽnu gi môdes sculun
2928 fastes fâhen; ne sî iu forht hugi,
2929  gi baldlîco: ik bium that barn godes,
2930 is selƀes sunu, the iu uuið thesumu sêe scal,
2931 mundon uuið thesan meristrôm.ʼ Thô sprac imu ên thero manno angegin
2932 oƀar bord skipes,  gumo,
2933 Petrus  gôdo - ni uuelde pîne tholon,
2934 uuatares uuîti -: ʽef thu it uualdand sîsʼ, quað he,
2935 ʽhêrro the gôdo, sô mi an mînumu hugi thunkit,
2936  mi than tharod gangan te thi oƀar thesen geƀenes strôm,
2937  oƀar diap uuater, ef thu mîn drohtin sîs,
2938 managoro mundboro.ʼ Thô hêt ine mahtig Crist
2939 gangan imu tegegnes. He uuarð garu sâno,
2940 stôp  themu stamne endi strîdiun geng
2941 forð te is .  flôd anthabde
2942 thene man thurh maht godes, antat he  an is môde bigan
2943 andrâden diap uuater, thô he drîƀen gisah
2944 thene uuêg mid uuindu: uundun ina ,
2945  strôm umbihring. Reht sô he thô an is hugi tuehode,
2946 sô uuêk imu that uuater under, endi he an thene uuâg innan,
2947 sank an thene sêostrôm, endi  hriop sân aftar thiu
2948  te themu godes sunie endi gerno bad,
2949 that he ine thô  he an  uuas,
2950 thegan an gethuinge. Thiodo drohtin
2951 antfeng ine  is faðmun endi frâgode sâna,

2953 uuiten that te uuârun, that  uuatares 
2954 an themu sêe innen thînes sîðes ni mahte,
2955 lagustrôm , sô lango sô thu  gelôƀon te mi
2956 an thînumu  hardo. Nu uuilliu ik thi an helpun uuesen,
2957  an thesaru nôdiʼ. Thô nam ine alomahtig,
2958 hêlag bi handun: thô uuarð imu eft hlutter uuater
2959 fast under fôtun, endi sie an fâði samad
2960 bêðea gengun, antat sie oƀar bord skipes
2961 stôpun  themu strôme,  an themu stamne gesat
2962 allaro barno bezt. Thô  brêd uuater,
2963 strômos gestillid, endi sie te staðe quâmun,
2964 lagulîðandea an land 
2965 thurh  uuateres geuuin,  uualdande thanc,
2966 diurden  drohtin dâdiun endi uuordun,
2967 fellun imu te fôtun endi filu sprâkun
2968 uuîsaro uuordo, quâðun that sie uuissin garo,
2969 that he uuâri selƀo sunu drohtines
2970 uuâr an thesaru uueroldi endi geuuald habdi
2971 oƀar middilgard, endi that he mahti allaro manno gihues
2972 ferahe giformon,  sô he  an themu flôde dede
2973 uuið thes uuatares geuuin.
2973 Thô giuuêt imu uualdand Crist
2974 sîðon fan themu sêe, sunu drohtines,
2975 ênag barn godes.  quam imu,
2976  tegegnes: uuârun is gôdun uuerk
2977 ferran gefrâgi, that he sô filu sagde
2978 uuâroro uuordo:  uuillio mikil,
2979 that he sulic folcskepi frummien môsti,

2981 uuârin gehôrige heƀencuninge
2982 mankunnies manag. Thô giuuêt he imu oƀer thea marka Iudeono,
2983 sôhte imu Sidono burg, habde  mid imu,
2984 gôde iungaron. Thar imu tegegnes quam
2985 ên idis fan âðrom thiodun; siu uuas iru aðaligeburdeo,
2986 cunnies fan Cananeo lande; siu bad thene  drohtin,
2987 hêlagna, that he iru helpe gerêdi, quað that iru uuâri  gistanden,
2988 soroga  iru selƀaru dohter, quað that siu uuâri mid suhtiun bifangen:
2989 ʽbedrogan habbiad sie dernea uuihti. Nu is iro dôd at 
2990 thea uurêðon habbiad sie geuuitteu benumane. Nu biddiu ik thi, uualdand frô min,
2991 selƀo sunu Dauides, that  af sulicum suhtiun atômies,
2992 that thu sie sô arma êgrohtfullo

2994 ênig anduuordi; siu  aftar geng,
2995 folgode fruokno, antat siu te is fôtun quam,

2997 bâdun iro hêrron, that he an is hugea mildi

2999 sunu drohtines endi  is gesîðun sprak:
3000 ʽêrist scal ik Israheles aƀoron uuerðen,
3001 folcskepi te  that sie ferhtan hugi
3002 hebbian te iro hêrron: im is helpono tharf,
3003 thea liudi sind farlorane, farlâten habbiad
3004 uualdandes uuord, that uuerod is getuîflid,

3006 Israhelo erlskepi, ungilôƀiga sind
3007 heliðos iro hêrron: thoh scal thanen helpe cumen
3008 allun elithiodun.ʼ Agalêto bad
3009 that uuîf mid iro uuordun, that iru uualdand Krist
3010 an is môdseƀon mildi uurði,
3011 that siu iro barnes forð brûkan môsti,
3012 hebbian sie hêle. Thô sprak iru hêrro angegin,
3013 mâri  mahtig: ʽnis thatʼ, quað he, ʽmannes reht,
3014 gumono nigênum gôd te gifrummienne
3015 that he is barnun brôdes aftîhe,
3016 uuernie  oƀar uuilleon,  sie uuîti 
3017 hungar hetigrimmen, endi fôdie is hundos mid thiu.ʼ
3018 ʽUuâr is that, uualdandʼ, quað siu, ʽthat thu mid thînun uuordun sprikis,
3019 sôðlîco sagis: huat, thoh oft an seli innen
3020 undar iro hêrron diske huelpos huerƀad
3021 brosmono fulle  fan  biode niðer
3022  iro frôian.ʼ Thô gihôrde that friðubarn godes
3023 uuillean thes uuîƀes endi sprak iru mid is uuordun tô:
3024 ʽuuela that thu uuîf haƀes uuillean gôden!
3025 Mikil is thîn gilôƀo an thea maht godes,
3026 an thene liudio drohtin. Al  gilêstid sô
3027 umbi thînes barnes lîf, sô thu bâdi te mi.ʼ
3028 Thô uuarð siu sân gihêlid, sô it the hêlago gesprac
3029 uuordun uuârfastun: that uuîf fagonode,
3030 thes siu iro barnes forð brûkan môste;
3031 habde  giholpen hêleando Crist,
3032 habde sie farfangane fîundo 
3033 uuamscaðun biuuerid. Thô giuuêt imu uualdand forð,

3035 thiu sô thicco uuas mid theru thiodu Iudeono,

3037 the iungaron the he imu habde be is gôde gicorane, that sie mid imu gerno ,

3039 iungaron mîne: huat queðat these Iudeo liudi,
3040 mâri meginthioda, huat ik manno sî?ʼ
3041 Imu anduuordidun frôlîco is friund angegin,
3042 iungaron sîne: ʽnis thit Iudeono folc,
3043 erlos ênuuordie: sum sagad that thu Elias sîs,

3045 gôd undar thesumu gumskepie, sum sagad that thu Iohannes sîs,
3046 diurlîc drohtines bodo, the hêr dôpte

3052 ʽhue queðad gi,  ik sîʼ, , ʽiungaron mîne,
3053 lioƀon liuduueros?ʼ Thô te lat ni uuarð
3054 Sîmon Petrus: sprak sân angegin
3055 êno for im allun - habde imu ellien gôd,

3061 hêleandero bezt.ʼ Thô sprac imu eft is hêrro angegin:
3062 ʽsâlig bist thu Sîmonʼ, quað he, ʽsunu ; ni mahtes thu that selƀo gehuggean,
3063 gimarcon an thînun môdgithâhtiun, ne it ni mahte thi mannes tunge
3064 uuordun geuuîsien, ac dede it thi uualdand selƀo,
3065 fader allaro firiho barno, that thu  forð gisprâki,

3067 hluttro haƀas thu an thînan hêrron gilôƀon, hugiskefti sind thîne stêne gelîca,
3068 sô fast bist thu sô felis the hardo; hêten sculun  firiho barn
3069 sancte Pêter: oƀar themu  scal man mînen seli uuirkean,
